participant_1.background:
I'd love to have lunch with George Lucas and talk about the powers of crystals in Star Wars.
My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.
its good to eat a lot of veggies.
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.

participant_2.background:
I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.
i build aquariums for a living.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I like to cook and eat Italian food on my own.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm good, thank you.
What are your hobbies?
I like to cook and eat Italian food, go to concerts on the weekend, and spend time with my dolls.
That's a great mix of hobbies! I love cooking and eating Italian food as well, and I also enjoy going to concerts on the weekend.
That's awesome! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What's your favorite Italian dish?
I really like pasta carbonara.
Me too! That's one of my favorites as well.
What's your favorite concert you've ever been to?
I went to a concert a few years ago with my friends and we saw the Foo Fighters. It was an amazing show!
I've never seen the Foo Fighters live, but I've heard great things about their concerts.
They're really good live!
What do you like to do with your dolls?
I like to dress them up and play with them.
That's cute! I used to play with dolls when I was younger.
Me too! I have a lot of memories playing with my dolls when I was a kid.
Me too! It was a lot of fun.
Yeah, it was.
